item.title: What I am Learning in 2023
item.description: Django ðŸš€2023 is here, and I’m ready to blast off into the world of new tech! First up on my list is the one and only Django ðŸ¤˜. This bad boy is known for its ease of use and flexibility, plus it’s got a huge community of cool kids using it. I can’t wait to dive deeper and discover all its hidden gems like the ORM, admin interface, and built-in security features.
